descriptions.title: Normative Calculator - Potvin et al. NeuroImage
descriptions.description1: Normative morphometric data calculator for FreeSurfer 5.3
descriptions.description2: The use of this worksheet or its derivatives needs to be in agreement with the content of the following publications:
descriptions.authors: Potvin et al. (2016). Normative data for subcortical regional volumes over the lifetime of the adult human brain. NeuroImage, 137, 9-20. Potvin et al. (2017). Normative morphometric data for cerebral cortical areas over the lifetime of the adult human brain. NeuroImage, (in press). Potvin et al. (2017). FreeSurfer cortical normative data for adults using Desikan-Killiany-Tourville and Ex vivo protocols. NeuroImage, 156, 43-64.
descriptions.disclaimer: The authors take no responsibility for the use of this script or its derivatives. Not for diagnostic purposes.
descriptions.radioDKT: Desikan-Killiany-Tourville (DKT) cortical, Ex vivo, and default subcortical atlases
descriptions.radioDK: Desikan-Killiany (DK) cortical, Ex vivo, and default subcortical atlases
descriptions.noresult: You clicked Cancel. re-Generate or Reset.

errors_warning.id: Could not find an id column in your CSV file corresponding to each subject folder.
errors_warning.ids: Could not find an UNIQUE id column in your CSV file corresponding to each subject folder.
errors_warning.filefolder: Error. Please choose a valid file and folder.
errors_warning.same: Warning! Found same structure with a different value.
errors_warning.nofolder: Did not find any STATS folders.
errors_warning.wrongCSV: There is a problem with the necessary columns in the CSV. See Instructions.
